mean_cn: n.（镶于劣质东西上的）镶面板；  v.给…镶以饰片
mean_en: a thin layer of wood or other material that is attached to the surface of something in order to make it look better
sentence: These flooring samples have a thin veneer covering the cheaper materials underneath.
sentence_trans: 这些地板样品有一层薄薄的镶面板，掩盖了下面的便宜材料。
